data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Han, Huilin, Hu, Yanqing (2016): A new species of the genus Meganola Dyar, 1898 (Lepidoptera, Nolidae, Nolinae) from China.
